name: jwt-decode-es
description: Decode JWT tokens. Use with NodeJs and browsers. Supports ES, CJS, UMD modules

scripts.test: npm run build && npm run test-node && npm run test-phantom
scripts.build: npm run build:umd && npm run build:cjs && npm run build:mjs && npm run build:min
scripts.build:min: npm run build:umd-min && npm run build:cjs-min && npm run build:mjs-min
scripts.build:umd: rollup lib/index.mjs --file build/jwt-decode.js --format umd -n jwt_decode_es --sourcemap -p buble
scripts.build:umd-min: rollup lib/index.mjs --file build/jwt-decode.min.js --format umd -n jwt_decode_es --sourcemap -p buble -p terser
scripts.build:cjs-min: rollup lib/index.mjs --file build/jwt-decode.cjs.min.js --format cjs --sourcemap -p buble -p terser

author: Alexey Petushkov <mentatxx@gmail.com>, Jose F. Romaniello <jfromaniello@gmail.com> (http://joseoncode.com)
